pull.title: scripts and tools: Move non-linux build source tarballs to "bitcoin-binaries/version" directory
pull.body:
Currently, if a user makes a non-linux (`--os=w`, `--os=m` or `--os=wm`) gitian building with the `gitian-build.py` script, source tarballs are not moved to the `bitcoin-binaries/${VERSION}` directory.

This PR fixes this bug.

~~In addition, the `src` subdirectory in the `gitian-builder/build/out` directory is no longer used as unnecessary.~~

events.message: Move non-linux source tarball to bitcoin-binaries

events.body: Personally I would prefer to keep gitian build yml as it and copy it from src directory every build stage to keep compatibility with previous copied gitian-build.sh or gitian-build.py script.
@fanquake Would you mind reviewing this PR?
